title: Marzio's Revenge
description: What if you had to make a choice? The choice to exist, or lose the only reason you do exist? Justin Bertolli must meet and defeat his enemy, if only to save his vampire wife, Ambra. But can he sustain the pain and torture to make it through the hardest test of his immortal life?Alternate cover image edition of B01F9OOZ7A
author: Barbra E. Ross
